title: pix_threshold_bernsen
description: `pix_threshold_bernsen` applies a dynamic tiled threshold filter to greyscale images for binarization. It calculates a threshold for each tile based on the mean of the min and max pixel values within a surrounding square, setting pixels above the threshold to 1 and others to 0. This object is useful for converting greyscale images into binary (black and white) images with adaptive local contrast.
